definition: owing feudal allegiance to or being subject to a sovereign, a person holding a fief
details:
adjective
- owing feudal allegiance to or being subject to a sovereign
= example: owing feudal allegiance to or being subject to a sovereign
- of or pertaining to the relation of a feudal vassal to his lord
= example: of or pertaining to the relation of a feudal vassal to his lord
noun
- a person holding a fief
= synonyms: liege
